title: Whimsical Game Music
description: Whimsical music journey perfect for casual or simulation games!
longDescription:
Embark on a whimsical journey with my brand-new collection of game music! Let yourself be swept away by the magic as lively melodies intertwine with enchanting harmonies, adding a sprinkle of wonder to every puzzle you encounter. Allow the music to gently guide you through the challenges, infusing your gaming experience with joy. It's like having a musical companion by your side as you embark on your whimsical adventure!


This versatile pack isn't just limited to puzzles; it's perfect for casual or simulation games too! Inside, you'll find 10 captivating instrumental tracks (16-bit, 44.1kHz WAV files), each crafted to loop seamlessly and providing over 21 minutes of authentic whimsical game music.


Preview: https://youtu.be/-mpVb3EsYlg

https://soundcloud.com/iustin-galea/whimsical-wonderland-demo-reel?si=ec87c4ff141a465281ed57046cd6bb93&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


Tracklist : 



Dragonfly Delight     1:48

Dreamland         1:55

Fairy Tale         1:46

Fairyland         2:33

Meadows Melodies      1:50

Peculiar Pond       2:23

Pixie Harmony       2:08

Whimsical         1:43

Whispering         2:50

Wonders          2:10





If you're seeking music and sound effects tailored precisely to your game, look no further! Whether your game features a horizontal or vertical system or requires scoring cinematics, I've got you covered with custom audio crafted to match your unique needs.


For a truly personalized gaming experience, inquire about bespoke music and sound effects. Drop me a line at iustingaleaoficial@gmail.com to discuss how we can collaborate and bring your vision to life through immersive audio. Let's make your game stand out with a soundtrack that's as unique as your gameplay!
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  10 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)
  •  All tracks are loopable
  • Royalty- Free License

 

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 21+ minutes
